.. _0_DWIN_ASC.HZK:

**************
0_DWIN_ASC.HZK
**************

The file 0_DWIN_ASC.HZK is in the DWIN_SET folder.  This file contains the font information which must be flashed to the DWIN display.

It takes quite a few seconds to upload that file, so you only need to flash it the once, then you can (optionally) delete it from the DWIN_SET folder.
